div.p: A code specifying whether and how the participant has attested his participation through a signature and or whether such a signature is needed.

Examples: A surgical Procedure act object (representing a procedure report) requires a signature of the performing and responsible surgeon, and possibly other participants. (See also: Participation.signatureText.)

valueString.value: Lock all vaue sets untouched since 2014-03-26 to trackingId 2014T1_2014_03_26

description.value: A code specifying whether and how the participant has attested his participation through a signature and or whether such a signature is needed. Examples:A surgical Procedure act object (representing a procedure report) requires a signature of the performing and responsible surgeon, and possibly other participants. (See also: Participation.signatureText.)
